title: Kinda Funny Forums Are Now Live!

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] when I first started working at kind of funny I never thought it would actually become a thing from the very beginning kind of funny was designed to be very positive very engaging but also remarkably fun to be a part of our goal was to create the most amazing and unique Community the world has ever seen and that's exactly what we did with the kind of funny forums one of the things that makes the kind of funny forum so incredible is it stunningly simple design we stripped away all of the Clutter by gifting you three undeniably perfect discussion forums kind of funny discussion video games discussion and general discussion with those astonishingly diverse options why talk about anything else people often ask if tree falls in the forest and no one is there to hear it doesn't make a sound well we ask if a new Star Wars trailer comes out and you can't talk to your friends about how awesome it was did it even happen no but now now you'll never need to worry about that again because
